title: Revamped Google TV app with new ‘Highlights’ feed is now rolling out widely
content:
The Google TV app was revamped earlier this year with Material You tweaks and a new ‘Highlights’ tab. This new tab essentially showcases YouTube videos, news, reviews, and other articles related to the movies and TV shows you’re interested in. The revamped ‘Highlights’ feed is now rolling out widely with the latest Google TV update,

The post Revamped Google TV app with new ‘Highlights’ feed is now rolling out widely appeared first on XDA.
description: Google is now rolling out its updated Google TV app with the new "Highlights" feed and a bunch of other changes.
